title: Fracture Glass Dry Erase Board Planner, Large, 15.6 x 20.8 inches, Made in The USA (Metro Weekly Planner)
features: Writeboards have a stain-proof, ultra-erasable glass writing surface of 15.6" width x 20.8" height, with a non-glare matte finish.
Accessory kit includes black dry-erase marker with eraser cap, plus attachable marker-holder that adheres anywhere on the board.
Easy to hang with a low-profile backing that mounts flush to the wall with included 3M Command strips.
Sustainably made in the USA by Fracture, a brand considered the gold standard in glass printing since 2009.
Covered by a 60-day Happiness Guarantee, plus a Lifetime Warranty on the construction of all products.
description: Practical, beautifully designed weekly planners, to-do lists, and more, printed directly on glassâ€”the superior medium for dry erase. All Writeboards are printed on smooth, frameless glass with a low-glare matte finish for the optimal writing surface. Ready to mount with included Command strips on any wall in your kitchen, office, or wherever you use your planner most.
